document.full_text: one day after geoffrey mutai won the boston marathon in 2 hours, 3 minutes, 2 seconds ' the fastest time ever for the 26.2-mile distance ' race officials said they will ask track's international governing body to certify his time as a world record even though the course is technically ineligible.
document.title: boston wants mutai's 2:03:02 to be world record
